Where to Park?

Parking

Where you can park:

Check out the Map of Parking near Awesome Inc.

Park Here:
Option 1: Behind building at the corner of Main and Midland/E. Vine (formerly People’s Exchange Bank)
Option 2: Lot to the left of Awesome Inc building
Option 3: Metered spots behind the building (on Water St.)
Option 4:Parking Garage - across the street, under “Main and Vine” apartment/condo complex.

Do Not Park:
Outside the retail plaza (in front of garage)
Spaces marked for Wells Fargo, Commerce Lexington, Porter Paints or VisitLex
